#Tunisia: To help Tunisia cope with #COVID19, #France delivered 400,000 doses of anti-covid vaccines on November 26 as part of the Covax initiative. 5,990,946 people received their 1st dose (50.7% of the population) and 4,223,063 received a 2nd dose (35.7%).
